scripts.setup: node ./hosting/scripts/setup.js && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn build && yarn dev
scripts.release:develop: lerna publish prerelease --yes --force-publish --dist-tag develop && yarn release:pro:develop
scripts.restore: yarn run clean && yarn run bootstrap && yarn run build
scripts.nuke: yarn run nuke:packages && yarn run nuke:docker
scripts.kill-all: yarn run kill-builder && yarn run kill-server
scripts.dev: yarn run kill-all && lerna link && lerna run --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1
scripts.dev:noserver: yarn run kill-builder && lerna link && lerna run dev:stack:up && lerna run --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1 --ignore @budibase/server --ignore @budibase/worker
scripts.dev:server: yarn run kill-server && lerna run --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1 --scope @budibase/worker --scope @budibase/server
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:fix:prettier && yarn run lint:fix:eslint
scripts.build:docker: lerna run build:docker && npm run build:docker:proxy:compose && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh $BUDIBASE_RELEASE_VERSION && cd -
scripts.build:docker:proxy:compose: node scripts/proxy/generateProxyConfig compose && npm run build:docker:proxy
scripts.build:docker:proxy:preprod: node scripts/proxy/generateProxyConfig preprod && npm run build:docker:proxy
scripts.build:docker:proxy:prod: node scripts/proxy/generateProxyConfig prod && npm run build:docker:proxy
scripts.build:docker:selfhost: lerna run build:docker && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh latest && cd -
scripts.build:docker:develop: node scripts/pinVersions && lerna run build:docker && npm run build:docker:proxy:compose && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh develop && cd -
scripts.build:docker:single: lerna run build && lerna run predocker && npm run build:docker:single:image
scripts.mode:self: yarn env:selfhost:enable && yarn env:multi:disable && yarn env:account:disable
scripts.mode:cloud: yarn env:selfhost:disable && yarn env:multi:enable && yarn env:account:disable
